00039 #include <QPoint>

00041 #include "DifferentialGeometry.h"
00042 #include "ParallelRandomDeviate.h"
00043 #include "Ray.h"
00044 #include "RayTracer.h"
00045 #include "RayTracerPhoton.h"
00046 #include "TPhotonMap.h"
00047 #include "TLightShape.h"
00048 #include "TSunShape.h"
00049 #include "TTransmissivity.h"
00050 
00051 RayTracer::RayTracer( InstanceNode* rootNode,
00052                InstanceNode* lightNode,
00053                TLightShape* lightShape,
00054                TSunShape* const lightSunShape,
00055                Transform lightToWorld,
00056                TTransmissivity* transmissivity,
00057                RandomDeviate& rand,
00058                QMutex* mutex,
00059                TPhotonMap* photonMap )
00060 :m_rootNode( rootNode ),
00061 m_lightNode( lightNode ),
00062 m_lightShape( lightShape ),
00063 m_lightSunShape( lightSunShape ),
00064 m_lightToWorld( lightToWorld ),
00065 m_pRand( &rand ),
00066 m_mutex( mutex ),
00067 m_photonMap( photonMap ),
00068 m_transmissivity( transmissivity )
00069 {
00070         m_validAreasVector = m_lightShape->GetValidAreasCoord();
00071 }
00072 
00073 //generating the ray
00074 bool RayTracer::NewPrimitiveRay( Ray* ray, ParallelRandomDeviate& rand )
00075 {
00076         int area = int ( rand.RandomDouble() * m_validAreasVector.size() );
00077         QPair< int, int > areaIndex = m_validAreasVector[area] ;
00078 
00079         //generating the photon
00080         Point3D origin = m_lightShape->Sample( rand.RandomDouble(), rand.RandomDouble(), areaIndex.first, areaIndex.second );
00081 
00082         //generating the ray direction
00083         Vector3D direction;
00084         m_lightSunShape->GenerateRayDirection( direction, rand );
00085         //generatin the ray
00086         *ray =  m_lightToWorld( Ray( origin, direction ) );
00087 
00088         return true;
00089 }
00090 
00091 QPair< TPhotonMap*, std::vector< RayTracerPhoton > > RayTracer::operator()( double numberOfRays )
00092 {
00093         std::vector< RayTracerPhoton > photonsVector;
00094         ParallelRandomDeviate rand( m_pRand, m_mutex );
00095 
00096         for(  unsigned long  i = 0; i < numberOfRays; ++i )
00097         {
00098                 std::vector<Ray> currentRaysWay;
00099                 Ray ray;
00100                 if( NewPrimitiveRay( &ray, rand ) )
00101                 {
00102                         photonsVector.push_back( RayTracerPhoton( ray.origin, 1, 0, m_lightNode ) );
00103                         int rayLength = 0;
00104 
00105                         InstanceNode* intersectedSurface = 0;
00106                         bool isFront = false;
00107 
00108                         //Trace the ray
00109                         bool isReflectedRay = true;
00110                         while( isReflectedRay )
00111                         {
00112                                 intersectedSurface = 0;
00113                                 isFront = 0;
00114                                 Ray reflectedRay;
00115                                 isReflectedRay = m_rootNode->Intersect( ray, rand, &isFront, &intersectedSurface, &reflectedRay );
00116 
00117                                 if( rayLength > 0 )
00118                                 {
00119                                         currentRaysWay.push_back( ray );
00120 
00121                                         if( m_transmissivity && !m_transmissivity->IsTransmitted( ray.maxt, rand ) )
00122                                         {
00123                                                 isReflectedRay = false;
00124                                                 ray.maxt = HUGE_VAL;
00125                                         }
00126 
00127                                 }
00128                                 if( isReflectedRay )
00129                                 {
00130                                         photonsVector.push_back( RayTracerPhoton( (ray)( ray.maxt ), isFront, ++rayLength, intersectedSurface) );
00131 
00132                                         //Prepare node and ray for next iteration
00133                                         ray = reflectedRay;
00134                                         //isDirectSun = false;
00135                                 }
00136 
00137                         }
00138 
00139                         if( !(rayLength == 0 && ray.maxt == HUGE_VAL) )
00140                         {
00141                                 if( ray.maxt == HUGE_VAL  )
00142                                 {
00143                                         ray.maxt = 0.1;
00144                                         photonsVector.push_back( RayTracerPhoton( (ray)( ray.maxt ), 0, ++rayLength, intersectedSurface) );
00145                                 }
00146                                 else
00147                                         photonsVector.push_back( RayTracerPhoton( (ray)( ray.maxt ), isFront, ++rayLength, intersectedSurface) );
00148                         }
00149                         if (currentRaysWay.size()>0)
00150                         {
00151                                 currentRaysWay.resize(currentRaysWay.size());
00152                                 m_rootNode->Analyze(&currentRaysWay,m_mutex);
00153                                 currentRaysWay.clear();
00154                         }
00155 
00156                 }
00157 
00158         }
00159         photonsVector.resize( photonsVector.size() );
00160 
00161         return QPair< TPhotonMap*, std::vector< RayTracerPhoton > >( m_photonMap, photonsVector );
00162 
00163 }
